title: Alessandra Ambrosio slips into a plunging tangerine mini-dress and neon heels in a sultry BTS clip
text:
She may have stepped down as a Victoria's Secret model in 2017, but Alessandra Ambrosio is still a star in front of the camera.

The Brazilian beauty, 38, shared an insight to her high fashion lifestyle on Instagram on Monday as she posted a behind the scenes video of a recent shoot with GQ Middle East.

The lingerie model stunned in a neon orange suit style dress, which showcased her toned and tanned long legs.

Gorgeous: Alessandra Ambrosio, 38, showed off her tanned and toned legs in a neon ensemble in a new video posted to her Instagram from her fun-filled shoot with GQ Middle East

The mother-of-two was full of smiles as she worked the camera in the long-sleeved ensemble which had a plunging neckline.

Alessandra swished her long brunette locks back and forth during the magazine shoot.

To complete her look, the model added height to her already statuesque frame with a pair of neon yellow heels and a matching belt to draw attention to her waist.

Proving not every moment is full of glamour, Alessandra was spotted at Yoga Works in Santa Monica, Los Angeles, on Monday.

I whip my hair back and forth: The mother-of-two laughed as she flipped her long brunette hair for the camera

Playful: Alessandra looked sensational in a tiny orange mini dress with statement shoulder pads

Poser: She cinched in her incredible waist with a contrasting neon yellow belt which matched her shoes perfectly

The model kept her look simple in grey leggings, a white sports bra and nude slip on trainers.

Alessandra tied her brown hair back for the exercise session and added a pair of sunglasses to protect her eyes from the early morning sun.

The former Victoria's Secret Angel has been dating fashion entrepreneur Nicolo Oddi since July 2018.

Alessandra was previously engaged to Jamie Mazur, 38, for 10 years but they split in March last year. The former couple share children Anja Louise, 11, and Noah Phoenix, seven.

Beauty: Alessandra's outfit had a very daring plunging neckline which accentuated her curves

She's done this before: Alessandra was every inch the professional as she worked her magic in front of the camera

The brunette bombshell always ensures she looks her best, whether she's stepping for low-key outings and attending stylish industry events.

On her approach to beauty, she previously told Vogue magazine: 'I feel like in Brazil we have this whole natural thing because we have so many great natural products - it's something that's very important.

'Like I'll drink a lot of coconut water which is super hydrating, and we use coconut oil on the skin, and avocado.

'I try to avoid make-up if I don't have to work because I have to wear so much on jobs. I like bare skin, protected with SPF of course.'

Casual: Meanwhile, Alessandra looked chilled as she went to Yoga Works in Santa Monica on Monday
description: The Brazilian beauty, 38, looked radiant as she flipped her long brunette locks during a fun-filled photo shoot with GQ Middle East in a clip posted to her Instagram account on Monday.
